parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Waypoints

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attaches a static object via it is numeric ID to the given waypoint.

<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
* The [[#Syntax|main syntax]] doesn't work in <template><title>arma3</title></template> anymore.
* The [[#Alternative_Syntax|alternative syntax]] is (at least) available since <template><title>arma2</title></template>.
</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> waypoint [[waypointAttachObject]] objectID

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> objectID: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> waypoint [[waypointAttachObject]] object

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> waypoint: [[Array]] - format [[Waypoint]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - static object

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[_grp, 2] [[waypointAttachObject]] 1234;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _wp = [[group]] [[player]] [[addWaypoint]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[1907.5, 5746.5, 0.00144196], 0];
_wp [[waypointAttachObject]] (([[waypointPosition]] _wp) [[nearestObject]] 66220);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[waypointAttachedObject]]
</value></part></template>
